attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we are not a true democracy unless everyone has the vote. Children should be well rithin their rights to have a say in how their country is run.

when women were denied the vote it was considered sexist. Why should the young also be discriminated against in this way

Democracy means a country run by the people, if children are not helping to run the country does that imply that they are not considered people.

Help end the unfairness. Make sure that everyone has an equal right. Make Britain a democracy.
